scripts.install: bash -c 'for f in packages/*/package.json; do pushd `dirname "$f"` && npm install && popd; done'
scripts.test: bash -c 'for f in packages/*/package.json; do pushd `dirname "$f"` && npm run test && popd; done'
scripts.coveralls: bash -c 'for f in packages/*/package.json; do pushd `dirname "$f"` && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov && popd; done' | coveralls
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist; bash -c 'shopt -s globstar; rm packages/*/src/**/*.js packages/*/src/**/*.map packages/*/src/**/*.d.ts'
